    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Network(mainApp _app)

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void init()
      Attempts to connect to given IP, if it fails, initializes a server at that IP.
      static void receivefromAll(java.lang.String s, int ignore)
      If current app is server, it broadcasts the given signal string to all clients.

      If current app is a client, sends the action performed in form of string.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Network

        public Network(mainApp _app)
        The constructor function, closes already running socket (if server), and resets clients list.
        Parameters:
        _app - reference to the main Application for modifying GUI elements

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        Attempts to connect to given IP, if it fails, initializes a server at that IP. Also makes required threads to always listen for and accept connections, and messages.

      • send

        public static void send(java.lang.String s)
        If current app is a client, sends the action performed in form of string.
        Parameters:
        s - the string to be sent

      • receivefromAll

        public static void receivefromAll(java.lang.String s,
                                  int ignore)
        If current app is server, it broadcasts the given signal string to all clients.
        Parameters:
        s - string to be sent
        ignore - the index of machine where action was initiated, and not send signal to it again to avoid repetition
